strawn.longleaf.relay.server

Class RelayServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
      • strawn.longleaf.relay.netty.RelayMessageHandler
        • strawn.longleaf.relay.server.RelayServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelUpstreamHandler

    public class RelayServer
extends RelayMessageHandler
    RelayServer is a simple JSON storage and reflection server.
    Author:
    David Strawn
